title: I will create and maintain a website for your brand or business, using languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
description:
Being in the IT product development industry for more than 6 years, I have developed my expertise and experience in designing and developing customized web applications and websites for clients across the globe.
I have the ability to provide customized web based solutions, be it using CMS tools like wordpress, squarespace, wix or a completely customized dynamic website using basic level programming languages for example PHP and its frameworks for simplified applications, or expert level webapps using typescript languages NodeJS, ReactJS with various databases; MySQL, PostGreSQL or Mongo/MariaDB and GraphQL.
I have the experience of developing more than a 100 websites and some of the industries that i have worked for are education and entertainment, real-estate industry, retail and distribution platforms, wedding websites, ecommerce marketplaces, heath and fitness stores, non-profit organizations
HTML5 | CSS3 | PHP | Laravel | CodeIgniter | JavaScript | ES6 | BootStrap4 | JQuery | NodeJS |JSON | | MongoDB | GraphQL | Firebase| CMS| Wordpress
